Package drcl.inet.core

Interface Summary
InetCoreConstants  
 

Class Summary
CoreServiceLayer The container class for constructing a network node.
CoreServiceLayerBeanInfo  
CSLBuilder The container class for constructing a core service layer.
Hello Component that resides in a node and exchanges information with neighboring nodes.
Hellov Component that resides in a node and exchanges information with neighboring nodes.
Identity The component that manages the identities of the network node.
NI Base class for modeling network interface card.
PktDispatcher Implements the packet dispatcher component in the inet router architecture.
PktFilter Ports: (otherwise listed in drcl.net.Module) "up"/"down" port group: follows Below Packet Dispatcher Contract.
PktFilterSwitch The component which routes packet filter configuration request to appropriate packet filters.
Queue  
QueueBeanInfo  
QueueNI Base class for implementing a combo component that combines the functioins of both a buffer and a network interface card.
RT The component that manages the routing table of a network node.
sIGMP A very preliminary IGMP protocol.
sIGMP.IGMPPacket  
VIFPack
